settings.gb-top-bar-announcement-text: FREE SHIPPING ON ORDERS $150 AND OVER
settings.gb-popup-descriptiontext: Get the latest updates on new products and sales

meta.description: Halo One is a stunning and dynamic theme with a powerful layout built to capture the customer's attention. First impressions matter, and Halo One ensures your brand will make a big impact from the beginning to the end of the shopping experience. The large hero banner carousel is perfect for directing your customers toward promotions, new releases, and more, while the scrolling product carousel just below will help expose even more of your products. Alternating banners and product sections keep it visually interesting and lead the customer's eye through your entire page, which concludes with a video section, brand showcase, and latest blog posts. Built and supported by GordonByte, Halo One comes with 3 bold styles, making it even more versatile right out of the box — and you can customize it for any industry with the Page Builder.
